author: khera
msg: Som example continuation lines were missing "\" at end, so they were added.
Also inserted "make test" prior to make install, since that is good practice.

author: dougm
msg: we still want to run END blocks if hard_timeout jumps out of perl_handler()
yesterday's patch only made sure the END block was saved before the possible

author: ask
msg: Added mod_perl_method_handlers.pod to MANIFEST and updated Changes

author: dougm
msg: Apache::Registry will now save END blocks just after the script is compiled,
instead of after the subroutine call.  otherwise, if the client breaks the
connection, the hard_timeout will jump out of perl_handler(), and the save
will never happen.  Thanks to Robert Nice and Ben Laurie for spotting this.
